generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone surface that serves as a roadway for vehicles, including cars and the perspective of the viewer's vehicle.
- building: A large, ornate building with multiple windows and a roofline featuring dormers is prominently visible in the background.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are visible throughout the scene, lining the street and surrounding the building.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the building and trees, appearing as a pale blue with some cloud cover.
- person: A person with a backpack is visible walking on the sidewalk to the right side of the image.
- car: Several cars are visible, including a dark blue Peugeot in the center-right and a silver car on the far right.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles, both in the foreground and background.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, mounted on a pole, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign with white text is visible on a pole to the right side of the image.
- fence: A low fence or barrier is visible along the left side of the road, separating the road from a sidewalk or pedestrian area.
